armors.description: A pair of simple plate boots. Due to their weight, they slow down the wearer.
armors.label: plate boots

armors.description: A pair of marine boots with layered plasteel plates and enhanced servomotors.
armors.label: marine boots

armors.description: A pair of simple metal gloves. Due to the thickness of the material, they reduce general work speed of the wearer.
armors.label: plate gloves

armors.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers.
armors.label: marine gloves

armors.description: A camouflage clothing designed to resemble the environment. Gives user more time to aim precisely, but provides little to no defence.
armors.label: ghillie suit

armors.description: A full body, impermeable piece of protective equipment providing a full protection against psychic and toxic effect.\n\nIt limits the movement and manipulation of the wearer as well as provides no defense against any form of attack.
armors.label: HAZMAT suit

armors.description: A padded defensive jacket providing medium isolation from cold temperatures.
armors.label: gambeson

armors.description: A quilted defensive vest to be worn under armour for extra protection.
armors.label: quilted vest

armors.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the chest and shoulders.
armors.label: light plate armor

armors.description: A pair of simple metal shoulder plates.
armors.label: plate shoulderpads

armors.description: A metal chest plate providing the wearer with a high protection against most damage but limiting the movement considerably.
armors.label: chestplate

armors.description: A coat of armor made out of small metal rings linked together forming a mesh, separated from the body with cloth padding.\n\nBeing quite heavy, this piece of armor slows down the wearer.
armors.label: chainmail

armors.description: A plate helmet which gives moderate protection against sharp attacks.
armors.label: plate helmet

armors.description: A vest with wooden logs and planks covering the front and back. Quite effective against small calibre gunshots and sharp melee weapons, but completely useless against blunt hits and rifle shots.
armors.label: wooden armor

armors.description: An artistically terrifying war mask. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident. Being made out of stone, it is very durable but also incredibly heavy.
armors.label: stone war mask

armors.description: A thick jacket with armor plates inserted on chests, arms, legs and back. Very effective at protecting against blunt trauma, this kind of armor is often used by riot police and heavy infantry alike.
armors.label: riot armor

armors.description: A heavy combat helmet with a face covering plate. Often used by riot police units due to its effectiveness at protecting against blunt trauma.
armors.label: riot helmet

armors.description: An industrial heavy shield made out of reinforced steel. Provides a lot of protection against blunt damage, which makes it ideal for urbworld riot police.
armors.label: riot shield

armors.description: A high-tech and lightweight armored helmet with a protective plasteel-weave plate.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial conscripts and late-midworld military forces.
armors.label: trooper helmet

armors.description: A suit of light minimally-powered armor. Lightweight plasteel-weave plates block attacks, and neuro-memetic assistors in the lower body redistribute weight carried by its user. It is slimmer than other powered armor and can fit under clothes.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial conscripts and late-midworld military forces.
armors.label: trooper armor

armors.description: A heavily-armored high-tech helmet, with a solid plasteel-weave shell and omni-spectrum camera.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial stormtroopers and glitterworld peacekeepers.
armors.label: siegebreaker helmet

armors.description: A suit of heavy powered armor, built for increased protection while still maintaining mobility. Heavy layered plasteel-weave plates paired with a built-in energy shield emitter stop most attacks. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a human to wear this armor without immobilizing them entirely.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial stormtroopers and glitterworld peacekeepers.
armors.label: siegebreaker armor

armors.description: A full face textile mask. Hides the identity of the wearer while providing warmth.
armors.label: balaclava

armors.description: A camouflage hood designed to resemble the environment. Gives user more time to aim precisely, but provides little to no defence.
armors.label: ghillie hood

armors.description: A full head gas mask, which alongside the HAZMAT suit provides a full protection from toxic and psychic effects.
armors.label: HAZMAT hood

armors.description: A simple roomy backpack. Greatly increases the carry weight of the wearer.
armors.label: backpack

armors.description: A battle banner. Gives the wearer a fighting spirit and confidence.
armors.label: battle banner

armors.description: A bag with everything needed to provide medical treatment.
armors.label: medic bag

armors.description: Small quiver for arrows.
armors.label: quiver

armors.description: A simple tool belt with everything needed to nail a couple of planks or fix electrical appliances.
armors.label: tool belt

armors.description: Bandolier with ammunition.
armors.label: ammo pack

armors.description: A belt with explosives.
armors.label: explosive belt

armors.description: A projectile-repulsion device. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, but does nothing against melee attacks or heat. It doesn't prevent the wearer from firing out, and shuts down instantly if hit by EMP.
armors.label: ranged shield belt

armors.description: A belt containing a dose of resurrector serum. Injects the serum immediately after death.
armors.label: ressurector belt

armors.description: A small pack of ammunition and components that control a shoulder mounted mini-turret.
armors.label: mini-turret pack

armors.description: Old-school fragmentation grenades strapped to a belt. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby. Can be reloaded using frag grenades.
armors.label: frag grenade belt

armors.description: Glass bottles filled with flammable liquid, with a burning cloth in the neck, strapped to a belt. A favorite weapon of hooligans and desperate warriors from rim to rim. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby, setting chemfuel on fire. Can be reloaded using molotovs.
armors.label: molotov belt

armors.description: Electromagnetic pulse grenades damaging to electronic equipment strapped to a belt. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, disabling any electronics for a brief duration.
armors.label: EMP grenade belt

armors.description: A warm and long piece of fabric protecting the jaw from exposure to wind. Makes one hard to remember.
armors.label: bandana

armors.description: Used to shield the wearer from the sun. Required for any kind of stand-off.
armors.label: sombrero

armors.description: A flat and handy cap. Somewhat protecting from the sun. Worn by settlers and colonists during their daily occupations.
armors.label: flat cap

armors.description: A simple vest, providing a decent layer of insulation from both heat and cold. Greatly enhances social interactions.
armors.label: vest

armors.description: A great dress, most often worn by ladies and suffragettes. Greatly enhances social interactions.
armors.label: great dress

armors.description: A simple pair of leather boots.
armors.label: boots

armors.description: A fancy pair of leather shoes.
armors.label: shoes

armors.description: A simple pair of gloves.
armors.label: gloves

armors.description: A casual T-Shirt with a cool sticker on it.
armors.label: Casual T-Shirt

armors.description: A warm casual hoodie that doesnâ€™t limit wearerâ€™s movement.
armors.label: hoodie

armors.description: A pair of shorts, perfect for hot summer days.
armors.label: shorts

armors.description: A short skirt.
armors.label: skirt

armors.description: A nice looking collared shirt with buttons and a tie.
armors.label: Shirt and Tie

armors.description: A nice looking suit jacket.
armors.label: Suit jacket

armors.description: A nice looking set of suit trousers.
armors.label: trousers

armors.description: A nice looking hat with a soft brim and indented crown.
armors.label: fedora

armors.description: A pair of bib-and-brace overalls perfect for working in the field.
armors.label: overalls

armors.description: A soft, checkered, breathable shirt perfect for working in the field.
armors.label: Fleece Shirt

armors.description: A pair of thick enough jeans to provide some degree of protection from damage and cold.
armors.label: jeans

armors.description: A thick cloth coat protects from the heat of stoves and splattering of boiling liquids.
armors.label: Chef's Uniform

armors.description: A thick fabric military formal jacket used for certain ceremonies, receptions and celebrations. It contains orders, medals insignia and campaign ribbons. It is considered a symbol of courage and valor.
armors.label: Military Jacket

armors.description: A thick, protective coverall with a military camouflage.
armors.label: Military Uniform

armors.description: A jacket with highly reflective properties and a colour that is easily discernible from any background.\n\nMost industrial employees wear it as part of their personal protective equipment.
armors.label: Builder's Jacket

armors.description: Sanitary clothing worn by surgeons, nurses and other workers involved in patient care. They are designed to be simple, easy to launder and cheap to replace if damaged or stained.
armors.label: Doctor Scrubs

armors.description: A light coat worn to protect clothing from substances used in a lab.
armors.label: Lab Coat

armors.description: A sleeveless type of T-shirt, useful during prolonged exercise.
armors.label: Tank Top

armors.description: A formal, thick buttoned-down shirt with a sheriff star on the chest. Provides wearer with a sense of pride and accomplishment.
armors.label: Sheriff Shirt

armors.description: A full body jumpsuit made out of thick fabric or leather. Excellent for general body protection and manual labour.
armors.label: Jumpsuit

armors.description: Slightly heavier than a normal shirt, a tunic is a great isolation against cold weather.
armors.label: tunic

armors.description: Very light and thin blouse, great for hot climates.
armors.label: blouse

armors.description: A leather or cloth apron covering legs, waist and chest.\n\nApron like that is often used by craftsmen, doctors and chefs due to useful pockets and protection it provides.
armors.label: apron

armors.description: A heavy coat insulated due to animal pelt, providing warmth and armor.
armors.label: Pelt Coat

armors.description: A poncho crafted using neolithic tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
armors.label: Tribal Poncho

armors.description: A kilt crafted using neolithic tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
armors.label: Tribal Kilt

armors.description: A warm and long piece of fabric protecting the neck from exposure to cold.
armors.label: scarf

armors.description: A soft, flat crowned hat. Often worn by the military as a symbol of valor.
armors.label: military beret

armors.description: A type of helmet predominantly used in a work environment. Provides high protection against blunt trauma.
armors.label: Hardhat

armors.description: Sanitary mask worn by the surgeons, nurses and other workers involved in patient care.
armors.label: Surgical Mask

armors.description: A type of soft cap with a rounded crown and a stiff peak protecting the front.
armors.label: Baseball Cap

armors.description: A pair of sunglasses protecting the wearer from dangerous UV rays. Often considered to be â€˜coolâ€™.
armors.label: Sunglasses

armors.description: A pair of correction glasses, providing users with some degree of psychic immunity.
armors.label: Glasses

armors.description: A tall, round, pleated hat usually worn by the chefs.
armors.label: Chef's Toque

armors.description: A polished metallic piece of headgear resembling laurels meant to signify wealth and status, equally appealing to both senators and nobles.
armors.label: wreath

armors.description: A carefully designed helmet made out of a single large piece of wood or metal. A wide open gap near the mouth and eyes allows full peripheral vision and unmuffled communication.
armors.label: legionnaire helmet

armors.description: A carefully designed and decorated helmet made out of a single large piece of wood or metal. A wide open gap near the mouth and eyes allows full peripheral vision and unmuffled communication. This particular helmet includes accoutrement to inspire both its wearers and onlookers, when fighting side by side a centurion even pain itself seems dulled.
armors.label: centurion helmet

armors.description: A semicircular, open-bottomed garment designed to cover the entire body and shoulders. While similar to tribal clothing the toga is generally made with a more delicate touch and presents itself as dignified everyday wear.
armors.label: toga

armors.description: A carefully designed set of armor made from a series of reinforced metal or wooden sheets, forming somewhat of a carapace without sacrificing too much dexterity. Such armor is known to embolden one's mental fortitude.
armors.label: legionnaire armor

armors.description: A carefully designed and decorated set of armor made from a series of reinforced metal or wooden sheets, forming somewhat of a carapace without sacrificing too much dexterity. Such armor is known to embolden one's mental fortitude.
armors.label: centurion armor

armors.description: A wearable frame, powered by a system of hydraulics, electric motors, levers and pneumatics, designed to permit quick movement. Whilst it does not provide any protection, it allows the user to walk faster, lift heavier objects and maintain balance more easily.
armors.label: exoskeleton frame

armors.description:
A variant of marine armor with an integrated grappling hook on the shoulder. The armor is slightly less protective than standard marine armor. The launcher does not require ammunition, but time needs to be reserved between shots to wind it up again.
Privateers usually specialize in getting in and out of dangerous situations easily. Grappling hook connects to walls and solid rock and allows the users to quickly move to the desired location.
armors.label: privateer armor

armors.description:
A large, bulky suit that allows the wearer to passively produce Rum once every 10 days. However, it is not very pleasant to wear as it feels like wearing damp, humid clothes from excessive sweating.

The suit includes a high-efficiency filter, heat-exchange filaments and salt precipitators. Urine and feces are processed in thigh pads and throughout the design are tubes that link to different catchpockets. Reprocessed bodily fluids are distilled into an alcoholic derivative of nutrient paste which can be drained when all the pockets are filled.

Removing the suit causes the accumulated liquid to evaporate, and it takes a long time to put on and properly adjust to the wearer. Due to the design, it can only be worn with an undersuit and the lack of head covering, while reducing efficiency, is purposefully done so it can be worn with head protection.
armors.label: rumsuit

weapons.description: An improvised, rough, ancient-design pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range and is prone to jamming.
weapons.label: makeshift pistol

weapons.description: A small, home-made micro-submachine gun. It's short range and very prone to jamming due to the rough design and faulty elements. Its rate of fire tends to make up for its weakness.
weapons.label: makeshift SMG

weapons.description: A general-purpose gas-operated improvised assault rifle, utilising various salvaged components mounted on a militia rifle receiver. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy, but is prone to jamming.
weapons.label: makeshift rifle

weapons.description: An improvised design powerful shotgun that emits a large barrage of pellets. Deadly, but short range. Due to numerous faults in design, the amount of pellets fired varies shot by shot.
weapons.label: makeshift shotgun

weapons.description: An improvised, gas-operated light machine gun. Unwieldy and inaccurate, it is also very prone to jamming. Its long bursts of fire are effective against groups of enemies, but their shot counts are completely random.
weapons.label: makeshift LMG

weapons.description: A spacer-tech gauss rifle. A set of coils accelerate ferromagnetic sabots up to breakneck speeds, penetrating armor and piercing through multiple targets alike. These weapons are popular among frontline infantry fighting in mechanoid wars.
weapons.label: gauss rifle

weapons.description: A spacer-tech gauss pistol. An array of coils accelerate sabot projectiles from a revolving drum, penetrating armor and piercing through targets in its path. It charges quicker than most coilguns at the cost of decreased damage.
weapons.label: gauss magnum

weapons.description: A spacer-tech gauss lance. A series of electromagnetic coils catapult a single shot at hypervelocity, shredding armor and punching through any targets in its path. It is fired from the hip, utilizing an onboard computer to track and adjust to distant targets.
weapons.label: gauss lance

weapons.description:
An ultratech staff threaded with psychic focusing materials. While it is a solid melee weapon, its main purpose is to enhance the wielder's psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, allowing more use of psychic powers.
\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
weapons.label: persona eltex staff

weapons.description: An ornate favorite among wealthy lawmen and bandits alike for its increased firepower and range at the cost of reload speed.\n\nTales of steamworld gunslingers would imply this weapon and ones like it are capable of occasional incredibly lucky shots.
weapons.label: heavy revolver

weapons.description: An ornate pistol meant to provide the strength of a full-sized rifle with the portability of a revolver. Surprisingly high ammo capacity and range at the cost of a long time to reload and rather poor accuracy due to recoil.\n\nTales of steamworld gunslingers would imply this weapon and ones like it are capable of occasional incredibly lucky shots.
weapons.label: volcanic pistol

weapons.description: An ornate variant of a commonplace Old World pistol, effective at short and medium ranges.\n\nTales of steamworld gunslingers would imply this weapon and ones like it are capable of occasional incredibly lucky shots.
weapons.label: frontier pistol

weapons.description: An ornate high-power marksmen rifle originally designed for dispatching muffalo in a single shot. Once outfitted with a long-range scope and modernized reloading system it didn't take long for would-be bounty hunters to embrace the hunting instrument.\n\nTales of steamworld gunslingers would imply this weapon and ones like it are capable of occasional incredibly lucky shots.
weapons.label: rolling block rifle

weapons.description: An ornate and surprisingly portable shotgun meant to be fired one handed from a mounted position. Packs a punch, earning the title "boomalope leg".\n\nTales of steamworld gunslingers would imply this weapon and ones like it are capable of occasional incredibly lucky shots.
weapons.label: repeating shotgun

weapons.description: A small pack of ammunition and components that control a shoulder mounted mini-turret.
weapons.label: mini-turret pack

weapons.description: Old-school fragmentation grenades strapped to a belt. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby. Can be reloaded using frag grenades.
weapons.label: frag grenade belt

weapons.description: Glass bottles filled with flammable liquid, with a burning cloth in the neck, strapped to a belt. A favorite weapon of hooligans and desperate warriors from rim to rim. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby, setting chemfuel on fire. Can be reloaded using molotovs.
weapons.label: molotov belt

weapons.description: Electromagnetic pulse grenades damaging to electronic equipment strapped to a belt. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, disabling any electronics for a brief duration.
weapons.label: EMP grenade belt

weapons.description: A very reliable automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.\n\nThis structure was built by a long forgotten civilisation and the technology can no longer be replicated. It will never suffer breakdowns, and it operates more efficiently during solar flare incidents.
weapons.label: ancient security turret gun

weapons.description: An array of miniguns that can be attached to a turret.
weapons.label: ancient point defense turret

weapons.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
weapons.label: gatling gun

weapons.description: A portable, old time turret. Needs to be manned in order to be operated. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Firing speed increases the longer this turret fires. May explode when damaged.
weapons.label: gatling gun turret

weapons.description: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. It's not very accurate, but has a decent firing speed for a pistol and is quick on the draw.
weapons.label: double-action revolver

weapons.description: An ancient design of shotgun with two individually loaded barrels, that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets.
weapons.label: double-barreled shotgun

weapons.description: An ancient pattern bolt-action rifle with a scope. With its exceptional range, and low fire rate, it is unlikely to drive animals to revenge, which makes it an excellent choice for hunting.
weapons.label: hunting rifle

weapons.description: A makeshift explosive stick of chemfuel. They can be thrown a short distance, where it will explode after a random amount of time.
weapons.label: dynamite

weapons.description: A single-handed axe resembling of a hatchet. Light enough to be thrown accurately at medium range.
weapons.label: tomahawk

weapons.description: An industrial tech short range taser pistol. It delivers an electric shock aimed at temporarily disrupting muscle functions and inflicting pain without usually causing significant injury.
weapons.label: taser gun

weapons.description: A non-lethal air gun used to reduce irritability or agitation in animals or humans via anesthetic drugs commonly referred to as tranquilizers.
weapons.label: dart gun

weapons.description: A short peacekeeping baton with electroshock prod that delivers an electric shock aimed at temporarily disrupting muscle functions.
weapons.label: stun baton

weapons.description: An ultratech device consisting of a handle and an extendable laser blade. A weapon of gentlemen.
weapons.label: laser sword

weapons.description:
An ultratech pistol capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: laser pistol

weapons.description:
An ultratech submachine gun capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: laser SMG

weapons.description:
An ultratech rifle capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage over medium distance.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: laser rifle

weapons.description:
An ultratech scatter gun capable of emitting several beams of light with enough power to deal considerable damage.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: laser shotgun

weapons.description:
An ultratech sniper rifle capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage over long range.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: laser sniper rifle

weapons.description:
An ultratech multi-barrel device capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage with a long, continuous firing mode.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: laser minigun

weapons.description:
An ultratech arc lightning device capable of emitting a lightning bolt that disable electronic systems and sets enemies on fire.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

Used widely by ultratech marines during mechanoid wars.
weapons.label: tesla gun

weapons.description:
A salvaged pistol capable of emitting an unstable beam of light with enough power to deal moderate damage.

By using makeshift battery cells, this weapon is capable of quickly warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat quickly when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: salvaged laser pistol

weapons.description:
A salvaged rifle capable of emitting an unstable beam of light with enough power to deal moderate damage over medium distance.

By using makeshift battery cells, this weapon is capable of quickly warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat quickly when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: salvaged laser rifle

weapons.description:
A salvaged scattergun capable of emitting several unstable beams of light with enough power to deal moderate damage.

By using makeshift battery cells, this weapon is capable of quickly warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat quickly when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: salvaged laser shotgun

weapons.description:
A salvaged sniper rifle capable of emitting an unstable beam of light with enough power to deal moderate damage over long distances.

By using makeshift battery cells, this weapon is capable of quickly warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat quickly when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.
weapons.label: salvaged laser sniper rifle

weapons.description: A ballista-like turret capable of firing rapidly when set up and manned. Light enough to be used as a handheld weapon at the cost of firing speed, very effective against enemy infantry.
weapons.label: scorpion

weapons.description: A weighty shortsword meant to deliver piercing attacks as well as occasional slashing swipes. Many scholars consider such a weapon to be a slightly less effective precursor to the longsword.
weapons.label: spatha

weapons.description: A simple, elongated knife capable of being swung quite quickly. Generally favored by assassins or used as a backup weapon should one be separated from their spear or spatha.
weapons.label: dagger

weapons.description: A long-tipped throwing spear specifically designed to break armor and shield alike.
weapons.label: javelin

weapons.description: A ballista-like turret capable of firing rapidly when set up and manned. Light enough to be used as a handheld weapon at the cost of firing speed, very effective against enemy infantry.
weapons.label: scorpion

weapons.description: A large, two handed, shaped stick for bashing enemies. Extreme weight at the end of this tool allows user to crush flesh and bones alike, leaving enemies maimed, paralysed and often dead.
weapons.label: heavy club

weapons.description: A small, one handed club. Whilst it's fast to swing, it is not going to cause tremendous damage due to its low weight and short length.
weapons.label: light club

weapons.description: A sharp piece of rock mounted on a sturdy piece of wood. Often used as a tool, it has been recorded that tribal axes also served as a great weapon due to their small size and ability to inflict deep wounds.
weapons.label: tribal axe

weapons.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. A shiv is a short but sharp piece of rock or metal with a small handle.
weapons.label: shiv

weapons.description: A small pouch in the middle of two lengths of cord. Used to slingshot sharp rocks over medium distance.
weapons.label: sling

weapons.description: A set of crude rock or metal shards that can be thrown a short distance.
weapons.label: throwing shards

weapons.description: A small clay pot with various flammable substances inside - be it chemfuel, cloth, gunpowder or animal fats.
weapons.label: fire bombs

weapons.description:
A self-loading large-bore cannon. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges. It's slow to aim and it cannot fire at close-up targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
weapons.label: autocannon

weapons.description:
Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged. It's slow to aim and it cannot fire at close-up targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
weapons.label: handheld mortar

weapons.description:
A powerful, military-grade flamer based on mechanoid inferno spewers. It can cover the entire area in front of the user in flames.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
weapons.label: heavy flamer

weapons.description:
A rocket launcher that fires eight small-bore explosive missiles that track different targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
weapons.label: swarm missile launcher

weapons.description:
A self-loading uranium slug cannon. Its ultra-dense uranium shells can punch through heavy armor. It's more accurate at longer ranges, and can't fire at all close up.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
weapons.label: uranium slug rifle

weapons.description: Ship mounted anti-armor charge cannon, often utilised in ship-to-ship combat in low atmosphere.
weapons.label: gauntlet charge cannon

weapons.description: A manned gun that launches all kinds of shells. A variation of the mortar with all the benefits and drawbacks, however it has a 90 degree cone of direct-fire in exchange for having an effective firing rate that is twice as fast.
weapons.label: field gun

weapons.description: A manned gun that launches all kinds of shells. A variation of the mortar with all the benefits and drawbacks, however it has a 90 degree cone of direct-fire in exchange for having an effective firing rate that is twice as fast.
weapons.label: field gun

weapons.description: A manned gun that launches all kinds of shells. A variation of the mortar with all the benefits and drawbacks, however it has a 90 degree cone of direct-fire in exchange for having an effective firing rate that is twice as fast.
weapons.label: cannon

weapons.description: A portable version of the Autocannon designed for use by a warcasket. Due to a shortened barrel it has a lower range, less penetration and damage compared to the turreted version. However, it is very capable in close quarters combat which makes up for the slight accuracy loss at greater ranges.
weapons.label: warcasket autorifle

weapons.description: A portable version of the uranium slug cannon designed for use by a warcasket. Due to a shortened barrel it has less penetration, worse recoil and damage compared to the turreted version. However, it lacks the minimum range requirement thanks to a human operator and has better mid-range performance.
weapons.label: warcasket uranium slug rifle

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the pump shotgun designed for use by a warcasket. Each cartridge fired contains 4 pellets larger than slugs from a regular-sized shotgun, giving it better range, armor penetration and much better damage. The recoil is insane though, even for a warcasket’s recoil damping system.
weapons.label: warcasket slugthrower

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the minigun designed for use by a warcasket. It uses larger caliber rounds which are poorly made en masse due to how many rounds need to be manufactured. Thus, it has a slower rate of fire and armor penetration, but who cares because no one wants to be on the receiving end of this amount of dakka.
weapons.label: warcasket minigun

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the grenade launcher designed for use by a warcasket. A straight upgrade, it fires in bursts of 3 and benefits from recoil damping for faster recovery and better range. Like all launchers though, it has a worse miss radius compared to a hand-thrown grenade.
weapons.label: warcasket grenade launcher

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the heavy flamer designed for use by a warcasket. Thanks to the twin barrels and larger heat sink, it can spit out two jets of flames while also needing less time to prevent overheating.
weapons.label: warcasket heavy flamer

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the combat knife designed for use by a warcasket. It is only still called a knife due to size comparison to a warcasket, but it is capable of cleaving a man in half and is just as large. The preferred weapon for the faster moving warcaskets that prioritize lightly armored, isolated targets.
weapons.label: warcasket combat knife

weapons.description: A very unique melee weapon exclusively made for warcaskets. It combines massive weight and a cutting force that gives it no equal in melee combat. While it was intended for use against other warcaskets, it works just as well against smaller targets that would normally be considered armored.
weapons.label: warcasket broadsword

weapons.description: A terror on the battlefield, the charge lance received a massive upgrade for warcasket use. A considerably more powerful energy source gives it superior stopping power, able to fire multiple larger projectiles at a greater range with improved accuracy and penetration.
weapons.label: warcasket charge lance

weapons.description: Essentially a handheld smoothbore mortar that fires explosives in an arc, able to bypass enemy fortifications. Made by those who wanted to combine ancient naval warfare with modern technology. The accuracy is abysmal but the onboard fabricator ensures that artillery fire can be provided without ever needing a resupply.
weapons.label: warcasket handheld cannon

weapons.description: Essentially an upscaled charge minigun designed to be used by a warcasket. While firing fewer projectiles in each burst, the ammunition has been improved with explosive payloads. Designed as a support weapon that completely invalidates cover for the unlucky bastards on the receiving end.
weapons.label: warcasket charge blaster

weapons.description: A monumental piece of anti-personnel technology that can only be properly utilized by the oversized warcaskets. Practically an engine block fitted to the end of a mech’s limb actuator, equipped with multiple pneumatic plates covering miniature repulsor generators designed for riot control. In layman’s terms, a strike from the head will launch the target backwards by several meters.
weapons.label: warcasket gravity hammer

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the combat knife designed for use by a warcasket. It is only still called a knife due to size comparison to a warcasket, but it is capable of cleaving a man in half and is just as large. The preferred weapon for the faster moving warcaskets that prioritize lightly armored, isolated targets.
weapons.label: warcasket combat knife

weapons.description: A very unique melee weapon exclusively made for warcaskets. It combines massive weight and a cutting force that gives it no equal in melee combat. While it was intended for use against other warcaskets, it works just as well against smaller targets that would normally be considered armored.
weapons.label: warcasket broadsword

weapons.description: A monumental piece of anti-personnel technology that can only be properly utilized by the oversized warcaskets. Practically an engine block fitted to the end of a mechâ€™s limb actuator, equipped with multiple pneumatic plates covering miniature repulsor generators designed for riot control. In laymanâ€™s terms, a strike from the head will launch the target backwards by several meters.
weapons.label: warcasket gravity hammer

weapons.description: A military modification of the Plasmasaw, adapted for use by warcaskets for anti-materiel purposes. The original intention for this bastard sword was for it to be able to extend like a whip while also having a simple straight form, however issues with containing the plasma shelved the idea. Instead, the links are used to change the length of the sword as well as allow easier replacement of damaged sections.
weapons.label: warcasket plasma sword

weapons.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a wardrone.
weapons.label: mini-blaster

weapons.description: A portable version of the autocannon designed for use by a warcasket. Due to a shortened barrel it has a lower range, less penetration and damage compared to the turreted version. However, it is very capable in close quarters combat which makes up for the slight accuracy loss at greater ranges.
weapons.label: warcasket autorifle

weapons.description: A portable version of the uranium slug cannon designed for use by a warcasket. Due to a shortened barrel it has less penetration, worse recoil and damage compared to the turreted version. However, it lacks the minimum range requirement thanks to a human operator and has better mid-range performance.
weapons.label: warcasket uranium slug rifle

Each cartridge fired contains 4 pellets larger than slugs from a regular-sized shotgun, giving it better range, armor penetration and much better damage. The recoil is insane though, even for a warcasketâ€™s recoil damping system.
weapons.label: warcasket slugthrower

Thus, it has a slower rate of fire and armor penetration, but who cares because no one wants to be on the receiving end of this amount of dakka.
weapons.label: warcasket minigun

A straight upgrade, it fires in bursts of 3 and benefits from recoil damping for faster recovery and better range. Like all launchers though, it has a worse miss radius compared to a hand-thrown grenade.
weapons.label: warcasket grenade launcher

weapons.description: An upscaled version of the heavy flamer designed for use by a warcasket. Thanks to the twin barrels and larger heat sink, it can spit out two jets of flames while also needing less time to prevent overheating.
weapons.label: warcasket heavy flamer

weapons.description: A terror on the battlefield, the charge lance received a massive upgrade for warcasket use. A considerably more powerful energy source gives it superior stopping power, able to fire multiple larger projectiles at a greater range with improved accuracy and penetration.
weapons.label: warcasket charge lance

weapons.description: Essentially a handheld smoothbore mortar that fires explosives in an arc, able to bypass enemy fortifications. Made by those who wanted to combine ancient naval warfare with modern technology. The accuracy is abysmal but the onboard fabricator ensures that artillery fire can be provided without ever needing a resupply.
weapons.label: warcasket handheld cannon

weapons.description: Essentially an upscaled charge minigun designed to be used by a warcasket. While firing fewer projectiles in each burst, the ammunition has been improved with explosive payloads. Designed as a support weapon that completely invalidates cover for the unlucky bastards on the receiving end.
weapons.label: warcasket charge blaster

weapons.description: Semi-autonomous flying combat drone with limited combat functionality. Equipped with a lightweight semi-automatic miniturret due to limited recoil absorption and an onboard self-destruction module to both prevent enemy capture and defense against melee attackers.
weapons.label: wardrone

weapons.description: Semi-autonomous combat drone with onboard pathfinding capability. Equipped with a self-destruction module and tracking system, designed to be launched as a payload and then seek out enemy targets. If no nearby targets can be acquired, it will immediately detonate in order to prevent future accidents.
weapons.label: spidermine

weapons.description: Old school condensed smoke canister that explodes into a smoke wall on impact.
weapons.label: smoke grenades

weapons.description: A flash grenade. Temporarily stuns organic enemies allowing users to close the distance.
weapons.label: flash grenades

weapons.description: Commonly used across the battlefield to dig trenches, this small portable shovel is an excellent close range weapon.
weapons.label: shovel

weapons.description: A short peacekeeping baton commonly used by prison guards and urbworld militia.
weapons.label: baton

weapons.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. The knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.\n\nCombat knife is a standard issue melee weapon for most of the military forces.
weapons.label: combat knife

weapons.description: A hammer is a tool that consists of a heavy piece of metal or stone at the end of a handle. It is used, for example, to hit nails into a piece of wood or a wall.\n\nThis basic invention is effective as a weapon, while being a tool at the same time. Needs some muscles to work with, but lets you construct with more ease.
weapons.label: hammer

weapons.description: A mighty weapon on the battlefield in the right kind of hands. Made to cut through flesh and bones alike.\n\nFavored by the Berserker clans, the battle axe is a weapon usually used by medieval knights. With a powerful swing it is capable of eliminating most enemies in close quarters.
weapons.label: battle axe

weapons.description: Halberd is a pike fitted with a light axe head. Due to the spear-like sharp tip, it's a great tool against armored enemies.\n\nUsed to fight down horse-mounted warriors in medieval times thanks to its its extraordinary length.
weapons.label: halberd

weapons.description: An axe head fastened to a handle. Suitable for one hand, due to the shape of a wedge it doesn't require significant force to cut armor and flesh.
weapons.label: hatchet

weapons.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a cluster of three large-bore explosive rockets. Good against smalll groups of tough targets.\n\nBecause of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
weapons.label: triple rocket launcher

weapons.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a massive explosive projectile. Good against large groups of soft targets. Starts fires.\n\nBecause of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
weapons.label: doomsday rocket launcher

weapons.description: Fires a single mortar shell at high accuracy.
weapons.label: rocket launcher

weapons.description: A modern day bow using levers system to fire an arrow over long distances.\n\nDue to the silencing mechanism, this bow doesn't emit any considerable sound upon firing, which makes it useful in hunting.
weapons.label: compound bow

weapons.description: Slow firing revolver firing large caliber projectiles over long distances.
weapons.label: Hand Cannon

weapons.description: Semi-automatic pistol designed for personal defense. The advanced counter-recoil system allows this weapon to be fired significantly faster than a standard autopistol.
weapons.label: combat handgun

weapons.description: Short double-barreled shotgun. Whilst not having the same range as a standard shotgun, this weapon fires two barrels in quick successions.
weapons.label: sawed-off Shotgun

weapons.description: A military issue grenade launcher intended for anti-infantry use.
weapons.label: grenade launcher

weapons.description: Mechanical incendiary device designed to release a controllable stream of burning chemfuel.
weapons.label: flamethrower

weapons.description: Filled with a multi-purpose flame supressant, this item can be used to extinguish any kind of fire encountered in the field.
weapons.label: fire extinguisher

weapons.description: Semi-automatic model of a standard bolt action rifle. Whilst not as accurate and powerful as the predecessor, it makes up with fast firing speed.
weapons.label: semi-automatic rifle

weapons.description: A rifle that uses a lever located around the trigger guard area to load fresh cartridges. Whilst not as powerful as other rifles, this gun allows for rapid reload.\n\nUsed widely around the western worlds for the ability to be shot single-handedly on the horseback.
weapons.label: lever-action rifle

weapons.description: Open bolt lightweight submachine gun with improved cooling, allowing for longer bursts before weapon needs to be cooled.
weapons.label: light SMG

weapons.description: A compact submachine gun. Whilst it doesn't have long range of fire, it deals significant damage in close range.
weapons.label: SMG

weapons.description: A water-cooled type of machine gun. It's heavy and unwieldy, but delivers tremendous amount of damage thanks to armor piercing ammunition. Belt-fed ammunition ensures continuous volley of bullets as long as the person firing them is strong enough to hold the gun.
weapons.label: HMG

weapons.description: A versatile and rugged assault rifle widely used around the galaxy by militia forces and mercenaries.\n\nNot as powerful as an assault rifle, but deliver 4 shot bursts.
weapons.label: service rifle

weapons.description: A semi-automatic rifle commonly used by special forces due to it's range and accuracy.\n\nSlightly longer range and higher damage than an Assault Rifle, but only fires two round bursts.
weapons.label: battle rifle

weapons.description: Short bullpup carbine, used often in close quarters urban combat.\n\nWhilst it's accurate at close range, due to the short stock it is incapable of firing accurately at rifle range.
weapons.label: carbine

weapons.description: A designated marksman rifle.\n\nWhilst it shares similarities with a standard bolt-action rifle, it trades off it's damage for firing two shots in quick succession.
weapons.label: marksman rifle

weapons.description: Being a .50 caliber rifle, this weapon was designed to fight enemy armored equipment.\n\nUsed widely around the rim in mechanoid warzones, this weapon is also useful against infantry, allowing for a 1-hit kill.
weapons.label: anti-material rifle

weapons.description: A crossbow is a type of ranged weapon in similar principle to a bow, consisting of a bow-like assembly mounted horizontally on a main frame, which is handheld in a similar fashion to the stock of a long gun.\n\nThis weapon attempt of early mankind can send a bolt even through strongest metal.
weapons.label: crossbow

weapons.description: An ancient pattern musket. As one of the first of its kind, it only has short range and low fire rate.
weapons.label: musket

weapons.description: This pistol features a smoothbore barrel and a long, wooden grip ending in a knob. As its name implies, the flintlock pistol is operated by a flintlock mechanism.
weapons.label: flintlock

weapons.description: A set of well balanced knives, perfect for throwing.
weapons.label: throwing knives

weapons.description: A traditional tool used for striking animals to aid guidance and earn obedience.\n\nCan be used on people.
weapons.label: Whip

weapons.description: A handful of rocks. Can inflict minor injuries in close range. Doesn't drop on death. Simple but effective.
weapons.label: throwing rocks

weapons.description: Longbow is a massive long range neolithic weapon, capable of firing a powerful arrow over extremely long distances.\n\nArrows fired from this bow fly overhead, avoiding getting stopped by obstacles.
weapons.label: long bow

weapons.description: A charged-shot pistol. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nThis three round burst pistol is a very effective sidearm deployed across all regiments of imperial commandos.
weapons.label: charge pistol

weapons.description: A charged-shot slug thrower. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nDeadly in close range, this shotgun has been banned by the imperial military for inflicting unmeasurable pain.
weapons.label: charge shotgun

weapons.description: A charged-shot submachine gun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nFires rapidly but requires to close the distance between the target.
weapons.label: charge SMG

weapons.description: A charged-shot light machine gun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nCharge light machine gun fires a volley of projectiles at extreme speed which makes it ideal for area denial.
weapons.label: charge LMG

weapons.description: A charged-shot triple barreled sniper rifle. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nDue to three separate barrels firing simultaneously, weapon power is reduced and rate of fire is decreased.
weapons.label: charge sniper rifle

weapons.description: A charged-shot minigun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nCapable of covering the entire area in volley of anti-armor rounds, this minigun is often used by glitterworld mercenaries during their infamous raids.
weapons.label: charge minigun

weapons.description: Fires a single anti grain shell at precise accuracy due to laser targeting. The warhead explodes in the air, releasing a wave of deadly electroshock.
weapons.label: charge rocket launcher
